Postcards

My 30th birthday is coming up soon and I thought you could all send me a present: a postcard from where you live. I want to see where in the world people who read my books are from, and have these postcards to show my daughter. I’m also thinking of having a big world map with pins in it, showing where these postcards have come from. That’d be really cool!

Please send your postcard with a little blurb of either:

  1. About your city / country or;
  2. How you know me

To this address:

Thanks!
